Comments_List: I learned how to use some software and imaging tools to 3D render objects.
Very disorganized and paced too slowly. Klaus had great pace but Alberto went too slowly and did not provide the information we needed to complete the assignments.
I assume this course will be much better next year. The teaching staff is great, so as long as they take all the feedback under consideration it should be worth taking next year.
